Rudy Guialani - Crooked Hillary Should Be Charged With 16 Felonies.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5vcGGHgwfFM

Freedom and 3 Types of Government.
1. Ruled by One (Dictatorship, Monarchy, etc...)
2. Ruled by Few (Oligarchy, Communism, Islam, etc...) 
3. Ruled by All (Pure Democracy for Trusted Communities and State)

While on this side of eternity, only one form of government ensures maximum freedom for the individual. #3 Pure Democracy.

What was not practical in the past Human History, with advances in  Information Technology, pure democracy is now possible.  

What say you?

Freedom and 3 Path to Peace

1. Peace through persuasion
2. Peach through separation
3. Peace through oppression

Most sane people of the world population want peace through persuasion or separation.  

There are few who want peace through oppression.  Examples:
- 7th-21st Century - Islam 
- 20th Century - Communism
- Various dictators and monarchies throughout the centuries

What is the proper response from those who favor peace through persuasion and separation? Those who want peace through oppression will NEVER leave people who want #1 & #2 alone for long.

What say you?

Freedom and Force

What is the proper response from those who favor peace through persuasion and separation against those who want to oppress?

Spectrum
Submit to Oppressors ..... Do Nothing....  Resist the Oppressor... Fight against Oppressors ... Kill the Oppressors.. other options???

What say you?
